title: (x) Meld dig ind - Scene {Mike}
content:
Hi!   
Could anybody please help me identifying this font?   
   
 ![Meld dig ind.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141414im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21453.jpg)   
   
If you need it, I can provide you with a (smaller) sample of the regular weight too...   
Thanks in advance!
author: nicolai

comments.content:
OK, letï¿½s try with a regular weight...   
   
 ![regular text](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141414im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21513.jpg)

I used the [Sans Serif Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141414/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=400878) and came up with [Agfa's "Scene"](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141414/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=400878).   
I had to guess at some codes, because your sample was missing the G and R, but the code was T32-48
